message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I can see you're interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $130 for it. Can you consider that price?
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still looking to save some money. Can you consider $125? It's the best I can do at this point.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $135 for it. Can you consider that price?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still need to save a bit more. Can you meet me at $128? That's the best I can do.
I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $137, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're willing to make one more concession, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget as far as I can. Can you meet me at $132? That's the best I can do.
I've made concessions, but I still need to make a profit. I'm not willing to go any lower than $140. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.

I understand this is your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to walk away if I don't get a better deal. Can you meet me at $135? That's the absolute maximum I'm willing to pay.
